Readme

LeapSeconds

Leap seconds in Julia

A new minor version of this package will be published everytime a new leap second is issued be the IERS and dependent packages will need to be updated!

Installation

pkg> add LeapSeconds

Usage

The package exports a single function offset_tai_utc which returns the offset between International Atomic Time (TAI) and Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) for a given date. For dates after 1972-01-01, this is the number of leap seconds.

using LeapSeconds
using Dates

dt = DateTime(2017, 1, 1)

# Pass a `DateTime` instance...
offset_tai_utc(dt)

# ...or a Julian Date
offset_tai_utc(datetime2julian(dt))
